basic summary functions
```{r summarize data, eval=FALSE}
summary(regen)

library(Hmisc)
Hmisc::describe(regen)

library(skimr)
skim(regen)

library(summarytools)
summarytools::descr(regen)
dfSummary(regen)
```


Summarize CEDAR data
```{r summarize cedar}
library(dplyr)

#regen %>%
 # filter(Species=="THO") %>%
  #select(Ht_cat, Freq, Browse_cat, Pred)

regen %>%
  filter(Species=="THO") %>%
  group_by(Site, Gap)%>%
  summarize(freq=sum(Freq))
            

```
